attributes.action: Release funds to adult learners who wish to study under a means tested scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a long term unemployed man, I have tryed various ways to get educated and back into work. There are no schemes however for low income candidates, to help pay for the cost of proffessional qualification's. There should therefor be a scheme in place, where if you are on a low income, unemployed, or heavily in debt, to enable you to fund your education and return to work, or head toward a promotion, opening up jobs further down for other candidates
